name: Juggernaut Method (4 Waves, 16 Weeks)
time_per_session_breakdown: Main work ~15-20 min, additional volume ~15-20 min
autoregulated: yes (adjust next wave based on rep performance)
overview_and_execution: Wave 1 uses sets of 10, wave 2 uses 8, wave 3 uses 5, wave 4 uses 3. Each wave is ~3-4 weeks. The final set each week is an AMRAP. Performance on AMRAP adjusts your training max for next wave.
example_application: Wave 1 (10s): Wk1 60%, Wk2 65%, Wk3 70%, each finishing with AMRAP. Then wave 2 (8s) at higher %.
important_notes: Complex but effective periodization bridging volume & intensity. Great for intermediate lifters needing structured progress.
volume_metrics: Each wave: 3 weeks of build + 1 deload. Main sets vary from ~3-5 sets plus 1 AMRAP.
